info.description: A Lucidworks Fusion microservice for Connectors management.
info.title: Fusion Connectors Service API

tags.name: configs-controller
tags.description: The V2 Datasource Configuration API allows to manage V2 (SDK) datasource configurations. These are the configurations that define settings for crawling a specific repository, database, API or other content source.

tags.name: content-controller
tags.description: The Content Sampling API is an internalAPI that allows to do a sample a datasource by running a short crawl and retrieving a limited number of resultsboth Classic and V2 (SDK) datasource configurations. These are the configurations that define settings for

tags.name: data-sources-controller
tags.description: The Datasource Configuration API allows to manage both Classic and V2 (SDK) datasource configurations. These are the configurations that define settings for crawling a specific repository, database, API or other content source.

tags.name: jobs-controller
tags.description: The Datasource Jobs API provides control over datasource crawl jobs. It allows to list, check status, start and stop datasource crawl jobs.

tags.name: partial-config-controller
tags.description: The Configuration Suggestion API allows to get suggestion on which connector plugin can be used for crawling provided content source.

tags.name: plugins-controller
tags.description: The Connector Plugins API allows to manage (list, install, update and uninstall) connector plugins.

tags.name: repository-plugins-controller
tags.description: The Connector Repository Plugins API allows to list connector plugins from the plugin repository.

tags.name: schema-controller
tags.description: The Connectors Schema API allows to retrieve available configuration properties for a specific connector plugin type.

tags.name: security-filter-controller
tags.description: The Connectors Security Filters API provides security filter queries generated for a specific collection, user and connector type. These filter queries are used by the query pipeline to filter out documents returned to specific users and group of users depending on their permissions.

get.description: Lists the V2 configurations linked to a collection. If no collection is provided, then all available configurations are listed

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of resource. It usually is the app inside which the resource is created

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The configuration to be created

parameters.name: validateOnly
parameters.description: Indicates if the configuration should be created(persisted) or just validated

delete.description: Remove all V2 configurations linked to the given collection. A list of the removed configuration IDs is returned

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name, linked configurations will be removed

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of resource. It usually is the app inside which the resource is created

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Indicates if the configuration should be removed even if a job is currently running

parameters.name: removeOutput
parameters.description: Indicates if the documents indexed should be also removed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The V2 configuration ID

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of resource. It usually is the app inside which the resource is created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The configuration ID

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: The new configuration

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of resource. It usually is the app inside which the resource is created

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Indicates if the configuration should be removed even if a job is currently running

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The configuration ID

parameters.name: removeOutput
parameters.description: Indicates if the documents indexed should be also removed

get.summary: Run a connector job and return the results

parameters.name: excludeBinaryFields
parameters.description: Indicates if fields with a byte array as value should be excluded or not

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The datasource/configuration ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: maxFieldLength
parameters.description: The maximum length of fields returned in the response

parameters.name: parserId
parameters.description: The Parser ID to be used in the sampling process

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The Pipeline ID to be used in the sampling process

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Indicates if the sampling cache should be cleared

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: An specific amount of time to run the sample, in seconds

get.summary: Return a list of data source configurations
get.description: Lists the data source configurations linked to a collection. If no collection is provided, then all available configurations are listed

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: The context of resource. It usually is the app inside which the resource is created

get.summary: Run a connector sample job  and return the results. Classic datasource configurations only

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The data source configuration ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: maxFieldLength
parameters.description: The maximum length of fields returned in the response

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Indicates if the sampling cache should be cleared

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: An specific amount of time to run the sample, in seconds

get.summary: Run a connector sample job and return the results with extra information from the pipeline

parameters.name: excludeBinaryFields
parameters.description: Indicates if fields with a byte array as value should be excluded or not

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The datasource/configuration ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: maxFieldLength
parameters.description: The maximum length of fields returned in the response

parameters.name: parserId
parameters.description: The Parser ID to be used in the sampling process

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The Pipeline ID to be used in the sampling process

parameters.name: pipelineParams
parameters.description: pipelineParams

parameters.name: refresh
parameters.description: Indicates if the sampling cache should be cleared

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: An specific amount of time to run the sample, in seconds

get.description: Return the status of all running jobs of the given connector type

parameters.name: connector
parameters.description: The connector type. If specified, running jobs of that type will be listed

delete.summary: Stop or abort all jobs for a particular connector type and collection

parameters.name: abort
parameters.description: Indicates if job should be aborted

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name. Linked jobs to that collection will be stopped

parameters.name: connector
parameters.description: The connector type. All jobs from that type will be stopped

parameters.name: wait_time
parameters.description: The amount of time(in milliseconds) to wait for each job to be stopped

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The connector job id

parameters.name: abort
parameters.description: Indicates if the job should be aborted

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The job id to be updated

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state to transition to

parameters.name: wait_time
parameters.description: The amount of time(in milliseconds) to wait for the update

get.description: Method not implemented, do not use

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The connector configuration id to be cleared

parameters.name: remove_output
parameters.description: Indicates if the content collection should be cleared as well

delete.description: documents indexed by the given configuration ID will be deleted from content collection

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The connector configuration id

get.summary: List possible connectors that can handle given input value

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The input value. It could be an URL, a file path, an FTP URL, etc.

parameters.description: The plugin id to be installed

parameters.description: The specific plugin version to be installed. Leave empty to use the most recent plugin version

parameters.name: connector
parameters.description: The plugin type

parameters.name: connector
parameters.description: The plugin type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The plugin sub-type

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The plugin id to be uninstalled

parameters.description: The plugin type

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The plugin type

parameters.name: collectionIds
parameters.description: A list of collection names. Security filters will be built for the configurations linked to these collections

parameters.name: datasources
parameters.description: A sub set of configuration IDs to build filters for. Leave empty to include all configurations

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject to build the filter for

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name. Security filters will be built for the configurations linked to this collection

parameters.name: datasources
parameters.description: A sub set of configuration IDs to build filters for. Leave empty to include all configurations

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to built the filter for

parameters.description: A sub set of configuration IDs to build filters for. Leave empty to include all configurations

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: The subject to build the filter for

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The collection name. Security filters will be built for the configurations linked to this collection

parameters.name: datasources
parameters.description: A sub set of configuration IDs to build filters for. Leave empty to include all configurations

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username to built the filter for
